abstract: Artist Marc Quinn, whose evolving and controversial body of work has brought him enduring commercial success, examines 'exploitative relationship between humans and nature' in exhibition The Toxic Sublime at White Cube Bermondsey gallery in London.
lead_paragraph: Marc Quinn’s art has always been daring, and his latest London exhibition is an example of how that audacity has taken different forms throughout his career.

headline.main: Marc Quinn’s ‘The Toxic Sublime’ Shows a Provocateur and Social Observer
headline.print_headline: The Sea as Cast by an Artistic Provocateur and Social Observer

snippet: Marc Quinn’s art has always been daring, and his latest London exhibition is an example of how that audacity has taken different forms throughout his career.
